name: ZOSU Ocean VR
description:
Overview:
- 30 ocean levels to explore, more of a relaxing experience than a game.
- Over 100 sea animals to save, the majority are randomly spawned.
- This is an easy to play, relaxing, and simple game where you are ZOSU the explorer and you are collecting sea creatures to save them from extinction to score points.

Controls:
- Builtin right hand jetpack for movement. Jetpack body movement is set to the direction of your right hand.
- Walking and jumping movement is set to the direction you are looking.
- Score points by collecting fish and finding randomly spawned treasure.

Gameplay:
- 2 game modes:
- - Timed scoring mode, 2 minutes per level with over 60 minutes of gameplay.
- - Freeplay mode, no timer and no scoring: explore and relax.
- This is intended to be a relaxing game and there is no way to take damage or to be harmed.
- Sea creatures include starfish, turtles, dolphins, sharks, whales, squid, dinosaurs, many common and exotic fish, and large sea mammals.

Additional Information:
- This game was designed to run on as many types of computers as possible on a standard graphics setting.
- This game was developed by a solo hobby indie developer studio: ZOSU Studios.
